page.title: 17Whitworth Brownies/Guides
page.content: We go to school in Shawforth, but our nearest Brownie pack is in Whitworth. In each group there are are about six people. We do a wide variety of badges. One of the badges is the Agility Badge. To get this you have to do hand stands and rolls. There are also badges where you make things, and a sewing badge. Some badges you have to do outside, or in the swimming baths. You have a handbook which tells you everything to do for badges and everything about Brownies. Our Brownie Pack is called 2nd Whitworth. There are twenty people in our Guide Company. It is called 1st Whitworth. There are our patrols in the pack:- Kingfisher, Robin, Nightingale and White Rose. There are about fifty badges altogether and some are very hard.
